entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow Grains, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 12:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Snow Grains
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
